name: Software Engineering Research @ Georgia Tech
tagline: Repo for the software testing and debugging tools
body:
Welcome to the Github Repo of the Software Research Group At Georgia Tech. You can find relevant information about the tools released by our group on this page.

### Tool Sites
* [**X-PERT**](http://gatech.github.io/xpert) (Cross-Platform Error ReporTer)
* [**FMAP**](http://gatech.github.io/fmap) (Feature Matching Across Platforms)

### Authors and Contributors
* [Dr. Alessandro Orso](http://www.cc.gatech.edu/~orso) @alexorso
* [Shauvik Roy Choudhary](http://www.cc.gatech.edu/~shauvik) @shauvik

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with anything on this site? Contact shauvik{at}gatech[dot]edu and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
